item.title: Evangelizing Yourself
item.author: mark@markrichman.com (Mark Richman)
item.description: A phenomenally inspiring presentation by Whitney Hess from IA Summit 2009. This really hits home for me, as I’m also a self-promoting introvert. View more documents from Whitney Hess.
